name: Consul
description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.

name: Grafana
description: Grafana is the open source analytics & monitoring solution for every database.

name: Let's Encrypt
description: Let's Encrypt is a non-profit certificate authority run by Internet Security Research Group (ISRG) that provides X.509 certificates for Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption at no charge.

name: Terraform
description: Terraform is an infrastructure as code tool that enables you to safely and predictably provision and manage infrastructure in any cloud.

name: Webpack
description: Webpack is a module bundler. Its main purpose is to bundle JavaScript files for usage in a browser, yet it is also capable of transforming, bundling, or packaging just about any resource or asset.

name: Vite
description: Vite (French word for "quick", pronounced /vit/, like "veet") is a new breed of frontend build tooling that significantly improves the frontend development experience. A possible better alternative for Webpack.

name: axios
description: What is Axios? Axios is a promise-based HTTP Client for node.js and the browser.

name: Jenkins as a deployment pipeline
description: We want to move away from Jenkins. Any existing Pipelines will be maintained but new pipelines should be done with Gitlab

name: Gitlab CI Pipelines
description: Current go to tool for building pipelines
